main event: Interview with Colonel Lawrence J. Tacker discussing UFO sightings and the official position of the U.S. Air Force in December 1960.
interesting points: Colonel Tacker believes there is significant money involved in the UFO subject,Colonel Tacker differentiates between 'contactees' and 'sephologists',He asserts that the Air Force has thoroughly investigated all UFO reports and has found no evidence of spacecraft from other planets,He mentions that up to 2% of sightings remain unexplained but does not link this to extraterrestrial visitation,Colonel Tacker predicts the decline of the UFO phenomenon as public interest shifts to real space exploration.
witness description: Colonel Lawrence J. Tacker, Chief of the Magazine and Book Branch of the U.S. Air Force Office of Information
